ticket.title: Cutover PublishEvidence + EmitEvent to AdmissionKernel (enforce PCAC lifecycle + bundle binding + policy-root trust prerequisites)

in_scope: Route PublishEvidence and EmitEvent through AdmissionKernel in authoritative mode.
Ensure PCAC lifecycle ordering and bundle binding for emitted authoritative outcomes.
Require authoritative policy-root derivation prerequisites for fail-closed tiers.
Ensure endpoint responses (including any streaming or partial acknowledgements) are emitted only through kernel-controlled boundary mediation for fail-closed tiers.
out_of_scope: Redesigning evidence schemas beyond binding completeness.

steps: Implement plan/execute wiring in kernel for these endpoints.
Add tests: deny on missing governance policy root for fail-closed tiers; deny on lifecycle bypass; receipts reference AdmissionBundle digest.

criteria: PublishEvidence/EmitEvent do not bypass kernel in authoritative mode.
Lifecycle + evidence closure is enforced and tested.
